data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

Yes, the verified records move over to the Bureau Extracts at night and the matched Queries validates against those records. A Query can only match a record that has been verified and moved over to the Bureau Extracts at 12am

Please ask Anthony to  make sure they verify their records and use a valid Court Date within a 5 year period.
The system only works with data for the past 5 years.

The Court Date should be greater than/ equal to "2009-11-21" (5 year mark).


Comments Below:

INVALID DATE - case number : 5874/2008, court name: Aberdeen
DOES NOT EXIST - case number : 2542/2004, court name: Aberdeen
NOT VERIFIED - case number :1425/2014, court name: Aberdeen
